title: Machine Learning-based Slope Stability Assessment Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics and statistics knowledge, foundational Python programming
context.additional_context: Practical Training Utilizing Actual Mine Terrain Data in VR Environments

learning_goals: Understand the principles of PCA (Principal Component Analysis) and BPNN (Backpropagation Neural Network) and apply them to slope stability evaluation
Implement a Factor of Safety (FOS) prediction model using Python-based machine learning libraries
Perform stability analysis processes on real terrain data using VR simulation tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
